title: Even Rotten Egg Pheromone Can be Loved - Novel Updates
tags: Charming Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Familial Love   Famous Parents   Heartwarming   Love at First Sight   Marriage   Military   Misunderstandings   Mpreg   Omegaverse   Possessive Characters   Psychic Powers   Smart Couple   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: Interstellar Hotpot Shop   星际火锅店
description:
Jiang FengQi, an omega, the son of the richest alpha and the most beautiful omega in the interstellar and someone who everyone wants to get to know, has a once in a millennium pheromone that smells like rotten eggs to others. Due to his pheromones evolving, Jiang FengQi’s pheremones make others unable to smell the real scent, causing everyone to believe that his pheremones actually smell like rotten eggs. 

Told in a first person narrative, this is a story of an omega with a rotten egg scented pheromone and an alpha with a cheese scented pheromone.>
